Articles.Content: Hey, I figured I would say a quick hello to everyone. I started playing KSP a few months ago (0.23), but I'm just now getting onto the forum. I'm not that good yet but I hope I can get better and help out around here.

Hello! (Input welcoming message here)

I swear to god that there are 15 people signing up on the Forum every day...
Hello tall_guy, welcome to the forum. How tall are you actually?

Welcome to the forums!

I used to have a roommate who was about that tall for my last year in college. He went by "Tall Guy" sometimes too

Anyway, glad to have you among us. Don't be shy about asking questions, or sharing what you already know with others who have questions of your own. For my part, I've attempted to collect some tutorials on a few of the more common issues into a single repository called the Drawing Board, which is conveniently linked in my signature.

Hope this helps!

Hey, I figured I would say a quick hello to everyone. I started playing KSP a few months ago (0.23), but I'm just now getting onto the forum. I'm not that good yet but I hope I can get better and help out around here.

i got the full during 0.23,to.

welcome to the forum.

Hello! (Input welcoming message here)

I swear to god that there are 15 people signing up on the Forum every day...

i fell like a spambot myself evreytime i post in welcome aboard.

not to discourage anyone from making there first post.
I played KSP for a while before deciding to join the Forum too.
